channel.title: Na'vi dictionary updates
channel.description: regularly and manually updated feed of updates.

item.title: 23 March 2017 - Updates and re-upload all files
item.description: 13.332 - Some minor updates?

item.title: 09 March 2017 - Update one definition
item.description: 13.331 - definition of pongu disambiguated

item.title: 02 March 2017 - New words
item.description: 13.33 - Vocabulary added from naviteri.org, February 28, 2017. 13.32 - Moved Na’vi clan names to Proper Nouns block.

item.title: 20 January 2017 - UPDATES
item.description: LOTS of updates. Russian now works.

item.title: 22 October - UPDATES
item.description: lots of updates. AT LONG LAST.

item.title: 19 April - New word, other stuff
item.description: 12.51 - Refined definitions for mìn and kìm, added tìterkup and maweypeyyu | 12.501 - April 10, 2012: Eana Eltu lexicon and dictionary maintenance system moved to LearnNavi’s main server at kelutral.learnnavi.org. Eternal thanks to Tuiq for his expertise and time creating and supporting the automation for this project. Please award him karma on the forum!

item.title: 09 April - New words
item.description: 12.5 - Added new vocubulary from naviteri.org, March 28, 2012 and March 31, 2012

item.title: 01 April: svin, transitivity, new words, etc
item.description: 12.412 - Corrected yet more transitivity markings. Thanks to Bllue Elf for reminding me. | 12.411 - Corrected several .vin markings to svin.

item.title: 04 March: m0ar words, and some edits [late]
item.description: 12.41 - Added description of optional use of eng from the UltxaAyharyuä wiki. Thanks to Ftiafpi for ﬁnding this. | 12.4 - Added new vocabulary from naviteri.org, February 29, 2012

item.title: 20 February: edits and stuff
item.description: 12.391 - Clariﬁed deﬁnition for keyawn. Corrected IPA for ’awnìm | 12.39 - Clariﬁed some deﬁnitions, added n. marker to fìtseng amf tsatseng. Added lepay (thanks Blue Elf!)

item.title: 29 January: some stuff
item.description: 12.382 - Corrected entry for ﬂawkx. Cleaned up some duplicated inﬁx markers.

item.title: 28 January: Finally updated
item.description: 12.381 - Corrected some truly silly mistakes in last update, Thanks to Plumps for pointing them out!

item.title: 24 January: NEW WORDS
item.description: 12.38 - Added new vocabulary from naviteri.org, January 22, 2012 | 12.371 - Corrected IPA for leskxir - Thanks to Eltu Lefngap Makto

item.title: 11 January: New words, plus one small change
item.description: 12.37 - Added new vocabulary from naviteri.org, January 9, 2012 | 12.361 - Changed loan-word entry Yu.E.Sey to Yuesey to be more conventional. Suggested by Tirea Aean

item.title: 08 January: added one word.
item.description: 12.36 - Added ultxatu - Thanks to Blue Elf for the reminder

item.title: 04 January: edits, corrections and such
item.description: 12.254 - Applied more suggested corrections from forum dictionary topic, 1-3-12. Also normalized nfp. and ofp. markings for existing words with attested usage. | 12.353 - Applied suggested corrections from forum dictionary topic, 12-28-11

item.title: 29 December: corrections and such
item.description: 12.353 - Applied suggested corrections from forum dictionary thread, 12-28-11 | 12.352 - Corrected some text corner markings and updated ftxozä si as vin. | 12.351 - Corrected a few typos | 12.35 - Added new word säsyep from Paul via Passi, updated deﬁnition of particle a | 12.34 - Adjusted deﬁnition of nìprrte’ and sno, added derivative sneyä | 12.331 - Corrected transitivity of rangal as vin

item.title: 12 December: new words, edits and such
item.description: 12.33 - Added new vocabulary from naviteri.org, November 30, 2011

item.title: 4 November: new words, edits and such
item.description: 12.322 - Corrected typo on leniting morpheme boundary marker for nuä

item.title: 1 November: new words, edits and such
item.description: 12.321 - Corrected a typo, some transitivity markings and a missing word from naviteri.org. Thanks to Plumps for catching these. 12.32 - Added new vocabulary from naviteri.org October 30, 2011

item.title: 27 October: transitivity edits and such
item.description: 12.315 - Corrected transitivity marking for hasey si, txìng and hum.

item.title: 15 October: IPA edits and such
item.description: 12.314 - Some IPA corrections and remarking kan as vtrm. New version 12.314.

item.title: 03 October: moar edits
item.description: 12.313 - Corrected entries for adpositions kam and kay. Also corrected IPA for irayo (how did we miss this for so long?)

item.title: 28 September: edits
item.description: 12.312 - typos/minor error fixes

item.title: 28 September: edits
item.description: 12.311 - Typographical erros[sic] and transitivity of various words corrected. Credit to Blue Elf and Plumps for these.

item.title: 26 September: new words
item.description: 12.31 - New vocabulary and phrases added from naviteri.org September 24, 2011 post. 'ampi corrected to vtr., nfp and ofp abbreviated markers added. New dictionary version is 12.31 - vCLI dicts up

item.title: 20 September: small updates
item.description: 12.301 - Added contractions from naviteri.org September 4, 2010 post and corrections vCLI dictionaries updated.

item.title: 13 September: new words
item.description: 12.3 - 'ä', tìomum, inan, ninan, txankrr, tsmìm, tinan, vingkap, nìvingkap, vin, mìftxele, zìma'uyu, fmawnta. vCLI dictionaries updated.

item.title: 18 August: few new words
item.description: 12.29 - lukpen, Toitslan, Toitsye. vCLI dictionaries updated.

item.title: 12 August: IPA typo fixes
item.description: 12.282 - Corrected typos in the pronunciation of several words

item.title: 03 August Blog post: new words
item.description: see http://forum.learnnavi.org/intermediate/the-dictionary-part-ii/msg482731/#msg482731

item.title: 24 July Blog post: new words
item.description: pllngay, kawngsar, lom, koaktan, koakte, koaktu, lomtu, fe', nìfe', wätu, fekem, tìlen, hawtsyìp, uran added.

item.title: 09-11 July, Seattle, new stuff
item.description: fwefwi, fwäkì ke fwefwi, taronyut yom smarìl added, stress corrected on tìftia, tìftia kifkeyä.

item.title: 27 May Blog Post: new words
item.description: säplltxe and säplltxevi added.

item.title: 26 May Blog Post: new words
item.description: Check the blog post for words which went in.

item.title: TEST
item.description: This is a test. Eana Eltu traslators, you may add this feed to your reader to get notified of when I add words to the English version.
